title: Large-scale study to bring precision medicine to traumatic brain injury treatment
author: Angus Liu
description: As part of an international collaboration aimed at developing more targeted treatments for traumatic brain injury (TBI) and reducing its public health burden, a pan-European observational study has | As part of an international collaboration aimed at developing more targeted treatments for traumatic brain injury and reducing its public health burden, a pan-European observational study has finished data collection, with clinical support from Icon.
